Osimiri nke Onwe m bụ ihe nkiri ihe nkiri nke nkeonwe m Idaho (1991). N'iji ihe nkiri nke Gus Van Sant gbara ma duzie na 1990, nhazi ọhụrụ ahụ nyere James Franco na Van Sant otuto onye nduzi
Ọrụ a bụ iji kwanyere onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị amasị Franco, River Phoenix
Franco kpọrọ ya Idaho otu n'ime ihe nkiri kachasị amasị  ma too arụmọrụ River dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma.
osimiri nke onwe m nwere mmalite ya na Hollywood Theatre na Septemba 25, 2011, na Walter Reade Theater na Febụwarị 19, 2012 na Film Society nke Lincoln Center na Febụwaraị 24, 2012.
N'afọ 2007, na nzukọ nzukọ na New York City maka ihe nkiri Milk nke afọ 2008, Franco na Van Sant zaghachiri ajụjụ gbasara ihe nkiri Franco kacha amasị ya, nke ghọrọ nke onwe m Idaho
Van Sant nwere mmasị na ekele Franco nwere maka ihe nkiri ahụ, ebe Van Sant dọtara Franco ka o nye ya nkem ndị na ụdị àlà úkwú nleta nke ebe ihe nkiri ahụ dị na Portland, Oregon
Franco kwupụtara ọchịchọ ya na Van Sant iji nweta ihe nkiri maka ihe dị anụahụ mma na onye ọ bụla n'ime anyị pụta nkiri mbụ ahụ.
Van Sant gosiri Franco nchịkọta nke ihe nkiri a na-adịghị ahụ anya
Franco nwere mmasị ịhazi ma chịkọta ihe nkiri ahụ dị ka ihe nkiri a na-eme ka ọ dịghachi mma
Banyere ihe nkiri a na-adịghị ahụ anya, Franco kwuru, "M dezigharịrị ihe nkiri ahụ dịka m chere na Gus nwere ike inwe ma ọ bụrụ na o mee nke onwe m Idaho taa,"

N'ajụjụ ọnụ a gbara ya n'ọnwa Febụwarị, afọ 2012, Franco kwuru na ya ejighị n'aka na ọ ga-ewepụta ihe nkiri ahụ na DVD, mana ọ rịọrọ nkwado nke New Line Cinema bụ onye megidere echiche ahụ, Franco kwuru na ha achọghị ka anyị soro ihe nkiri ikpeazụ ahụ sọọ mpi.
Abụ ndị na-akpọ n'oge ihe nkiri ahụ gụnyere:
